item.description:
WINCHESTER FARMERS' MARKET ANNOUNCEMENT

WHERE: Winchester Common, Winchester Center

WHEN: 2 hours starting at the posted time

THE SCENE: A small shady grassy common. On it are sparsely populated tents selling produce as well as an artists' tent for the Winchester Artists Network displaying art for sale. People circulate but are not at all a crowd. Adjacent shopping in the heart of quaint Winchester Center and a Starbucks and bakery for coffee.

WHERE TO MEET*: At the posted time, with 1 hour leeway for late-comers.

DIRECTIONS: Follow directions to Winchester Center. From 128, take exit 3 South, Winchester. Off the ramp continue straight about 4 miles. You will pass a 99 Restaurant on your left. When you reach Mahoney's Rocky Ledge Farm on your right, take a left at the SECOND lights. Continue straight into the Center.
From 93, take the Fellsway West Winchester exit. Proceed around the rotary and take a right onto South Border Road (there is a sign). Continue 3 miles to the lights. Straight through the lights, and the next lights, into the center.

OTHER:
RSVPs: It's best to let us know you are coming so we can look for you or alert you to any changes.

THINGS TO BRING WHICH ARE OFTEN FORGOTTEN:
Mosquito repellant, Paper towels, Sweater

IF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call.

*LAX: We meet at the time above. You have 30 minutes additional slack, after which we may leave to the painting site without you.

INCLEMENT WEATHER: It is up to you to determine if the weather makes painting untenable. Although, I will try to leave a message on my voice mail if I myself do not intend to be there.

Michael Emerald
617/968-0627
westpointusma@yahoo.com
item.name: PLEIN AIR OUTING: Winchester Farmers' Market
